experience.title: Independent Retail Market Research
experience.description: Conducted extensive field observation and analysis of high-traffic retail environments to identify successful customer engagement patterns and point-of-sale conversion techniques. Researched the psychological drivers behind consumer purchasing decisions and the impact of visual merchandising on floor traffic.

experience.title: Product Analysis & Sales Simulation Project
experience.description: Systematically reviewed top-selling consumer electronics brands to master the translation of technical specifications into relatable customer benefits. Practiced objection-handling frameworks and closing strategies based on industry-standard retail sales training materials.

metadata.experience_level: Relevant research done for the job field.
